subject: Performance Test Doubt
msgSnippet: Hello! Now I have a situation, which I do not how to start with. I am testing a web-application s functionallity with JUnit, and HttpUnit. This is fine. Now I
messageBody:
Hello!
Now I have a situation, which I do not how to start
with.

I am testing a web-application's functionallity with
JUnit, and HttpUnit. This is fine.
Now I have to test the performance of the application,
like the time it takes to upload the browser, or the
time taken to return if a number os users, send the
request.

Now I know That I can Do this with the Junitperf, but
my doubt is that what do I have to test, What I was
thinking is to do the performanceTest of the test that
test the functionality, I think this will be right.
Otherwise How will I be really be able to do the
performance testing for time it takes to open the
browser.
The following will make the things more clear to you.


testOpenBrowser(), this tests that browser exists, and
not if we have to check the time it takes to access
the browser we will perform the Time test on
testOpenBrowser(), and not directly on the Browser,
because testBrowser() id the one that is opening the
browser.

--------------------------------------------------
Thanks

=====
Regards
Harbir singh Hundal
